title: Takashi Umezawa
text:
is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Playing career.
Umezawa was born in <a href="Mie%20Prefecture">Mie Prefecture</a> on December 7, 1972. After graduating from high school, he played for <a href="Gamba%20Osaka">Gamba Osaka</a>. He could not play at all in the match until 1993. He debuted against <a href="Yokohama%20F.%20Marinos">Yokohama Marinos</a> on June 8, 1994. However he could hardly play in the match and retired end of 1994 season.
